coreAttributes.name: oily Well-Done Steak
coreAttributes.description: A chunk of well cooked meat that is covered in oil. Provides a low boost to your physique and a slight heal. Must have been stuck onto a gogmazios.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/5)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel unusually energized!

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the hunk of steak from [npc.her] inventory, the meat looking rather well-done, too bad it's covered in oil. [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] eating. The meaty taste, and slightly cold feeling of the steak dominates [npc.her] mouth, but [npc.she] [npc.do]n't take any time to really notice, as [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] chewing on the meat, the delicious taste bringing out an immensely primal glint in [npc.her] eyes, and in only a matter of moments, [npc.she] [npc.has] completely consumed the steak. [npc.Name] pat [npc.her] sufficiently stuffed stomach.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the hunk of steak from [npc.her] inventory, the meat looking rather well-done, too bad it's covered in oil. [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to breathe in the oily , meaty smell. Quite hesitantly, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] chewing on the steak, the taste bringing out an immensely primal glint in [npc2.her] eyes, [npc2.she] [npc2.has] completely consumed the sticky steak.
